REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1107 reute u f BC-ALLIS-CHALMERS-<AH>-L 06-29 0063

TEXT.TITLE: ALLIS-CHALMERS <AH> LISTING EXAMINED BY NYSE
TEXT.BODY: The New York Stock Exhcange said it is reviewing the eligiblity for continued listing of the common stock and 5.875 dlrs cumulative convertible preferred stock, series C, of Allis-Chalmers Corp in view of its announcement that it has filed a voluntary petition under Chapter 11 of the Federal bankruptcy code. Reuter
